name: Viper III
description: A simple sci-fi side-scrolling game, it is your job to navigate a range of different obstacles and enemies to save the planet Nimea from the evil Quardons. Using laser fire you must destroy both drones and bosses to increase your score and advance deeper and deeper into your foes defences. On top of this fuel is a limited resource and is depleted when attacking, so choose your shots carefully or you may find yourself falling into their hands.
